Task: Turn off the living room light_224_9
Description: Walk to floor lamp. Observe how to activate floor lamp. Activate floor lamp. Walk to desk lamp. Observe how to activate desk lamp. Activate desk lamp.
Find VaseOpen. Pick up VaseOpen and tap hard against the window.
first check the blinds, its open now. so close the blinds.
Find the bed and check if it is dirty. If is dirty clean it.
Take the sporting equipment. Then keep the equipment.
Walk to desk. Pick up book. Turn to face mirror. Throw book at mirror.

Task: Turn off all the bedroom light_302_9
Description: Walk to desk. Observe lamp status. Observe how to activate lamp. Activate lamp.
Walk to bed. Pick up teddy bear, and pillow. Place teddy bear and pillow on floor.
Walk to window. Observe blinds. Observe how to activate blinds. Activate blinds.
Blow out the candle that is on the counter top.
Pick up the towel from the hand towel holder and place it in the sink and turn the faucet on.
open the bath room faucet and let water flow into the sink basin until it is full
Spray water from the spray bottle on the mirror and wipe it using had towel.

Task: Throw away used toilet roll and soap bottle_411_9
Description: Find toilet roll/ and soap bottle in the room. Check if used. If used throw them in the bin.
Firstly, find HandTowelHolder.Hang HandTowel in the HandTowelHolder.
Find bathtub in the room. Find ShowerHead. Turn on the ShowerHead to release water.
Find plunger in the room, Take it near the ShowerGlass. Hit ShowerGlass with plunger until glass is broken.
Firstly find all the valuable items (like cell phone, credit card, laptop etc) and keep all of them safely in the cabinet/drawer.
Locate wateringcan. Pick up wateringcan. Locate houseplant. Walk to houseplant. Pour water from wateringcan into houseplant.
Take some fresh water and find the kettle in this room.boil the water on the counter top.

Task: Fill up the bathtub with water_402_9
Description: Turn on the bathtub faucet. Fill up the bathtub basin with water. Turn off the bathtub faucet.
Walk to the bathroom. Go to the shower. Grab the curtains and close them.

Firstly pour milk into the coffee machine. Switch on the coffee machine, prepare coffee and switch off the machine. Add sugar to taste. Next place a pan on the stove (gas burner) and keep the stove knob in simmer. Take and egg and break it into the pan. Let it fry and stir occasionally with spatula. Add salt (using salt shaker) and pepper (using pepper shaker) to taste. Next take a bread and place it in the toaster. Switch on the toaster, let the bread toast and then switch off the toaster.
